name: GraphicLayer
shortdesc: A layer in a PSD image or PDF file.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the GraphicLayer.

property.name: originalVisibility
property.shortdesc: Returns the visibility setting set for the layer before the graphic file was imported. Note: Must occur in the script before overriding the visibility state with a current visibility statement.

property.name: separatorLayer
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is a separator layer.

property.name: adjustmentLayer
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is an adjustment layer. Note: Must occur in the script before overriding the visibility state of the layer with a current visibility statement.

property.name: fxLayer
property.shortdesc: If true, layer effects have been applied to the layer. Note: Must occur in the script before overriding the visibility state of the layer with a current visibility statement.

property.name: locked
property.shortdesc: If true, the GraphicLayer is locked.

property.name: sectionDividerLayer
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is a section divider layer.

property.name: hasViewState
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer has a view state.

property.name: viewState
property.shortdesc: If true, the view state is on.

property.name: hasExportState
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer has an export state.

property.name: exportState
property.shortdesc: If true, the export state is on.

property.name: hasPrintState
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer has a print state.

property.name: printState
property.shortdesc: If true, the print state is on.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the GraphicLayer.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the GraphicLayer (a GraphicLayerOption or GraphicLayer).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the GraphicLayer within its containing object.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: graphicLayers
property.shortdesc: A collection of graphic layers.

property.name: currentVisibility
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is visible in the document.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GraphicLayer.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
